query:
UPDATE 
                        tasks
                    SET 
                        canonical_result_id =  
                        (
                        SELECT 
                            r.id 
                        FROM 
                            results r
                        JOIN assignments a
                            ON a.id = r.assignment_id
                        WHERE a.id = ANY($2)
                        ORDER BY 
                            r.created_at DESC 
                        LIMIT 1
                        )
                    WHERE
                        id = $1
